scripts.build: pnpm run build:photon && pnpm run build:awesome-framework
scripts.format:prettier: git ls-files | egrep '\.(json|js|jsx|css|ts|tsx|vue|mjs|cjs)$' | grep --invert-match package.json | xargs pnpm exec prettier --write
scripts.format:check: biome format . || (echo 'Fix formatting by running `$ pnpm run -w format`.' && exit 1)
scripts.reset: git clean -Xdf && pnpm install && pnpm run build
